News.headline: Daggers Club Shop Final Opening Day
News.page_title: Daggers Club Shop Final Opening Day
News.URL_keywords: Daggers Club Shop Final Opening Day
News.short_description: Don't forget the Daggers Club Shop will be open today for the last time before Christmas Day for all Daggers fans hoping to take advantage of our Christmas offers
News.description:
Fans wishing to buy a Christmas present for a Daggers fan in their life can do so today with the club shop open 3:30pm-5:30pm.

PLEASE NOTE this is the last date the Daggers Club Shop will be open before Christmas Day, don't miss out on your final opportunity to pick up a gift for a loved one.

Season ticket holders wishing to take advantage of our fantastic 'Friends for a Fiver' offer are also able to purchase these in the club shop, as this offer is in advance only; so don't miss out!

We also have a selection of different offers available in our club shop including Football Manager 2017 for only £25.00 (RRP £34.99). We will also will be selling our half-year season tickets available with adult season tickets starting at £120.

All opening hours for the club Shop can be found here.
On-line Shop: www.daggers-shop.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21

The Daggers offices including the Commercial, Media, Community Trust, Tickets and Shop departments will be closed until Thursday 30th December, to contact please email:
Commercial
Media
Community Trust
Ticket & Shop
